item.title: 飞机交付量增加，波音亏损减少
item.description: 周二，波音公司公布第二季度亏损减少，原因是这家美国飞机制造商从质量和监管危机以及去年导致大部分生产停顿的大罢工中恢复过来，加大了喷气机的生产和交付力度。【原文：Boeing reported a smaller second-quarter loss on Tuesday as the U.S. planemaker ramped up jet production and deliveries, recovering from a quality and regulatory crisis and a major strike that halted most production last year.】

item.title: 重塑美国货运网络的重大铁路合并案
item.description: 联合太平洋公司（Union Pacific）周二表示，它将以 850 亿美元的价格收购规模较小的竞争对手诺福克南方公司（Norfolk Southern），从而创建该国第一家海岸至海岸货运铁路运营商。【原文：Union Pacific said on Tuesday it would buy smaller rival Norfolk Southern in an $85-billion deal to create the country's first coast-to-coast freight rail operator.】

item.title: 基因疗法 Elevidys 在美国恢复发货后，Sarepta 公司股价反弹
item.description: 周二收盘前，Sarepta Therapeutics 公司股价大涨超过 30%，原因是分析师称其肌肉基因疗法在美国恢复出货部分消除了财务阻力，并降低了退出市场的风险。【原文：Sarepta Therapeutics shares surged more than 30% before the bell on Tuesday, as analysts said the resumption of U.S. shipments for its muscular gene therapy partially removes financial headwinds and decreases the risk of market withdrawal.】

item.title: 铁路运营商诺福克南方公司季度利润增长
item.description: 本周二，诺福克南方公司（Norfolk Southern）公布第二季度利润增长，主要得益于销量增长带来的收入增加。【原文：Norfolk Southern reported a rise in its second-quarter profit on Tuesday, aided by higher revenue from improved volumes.】

item.title: 金管局称明年初可能发放首批香港稳定币牌照
item.description: 香港金融管理局（HKMA）周二在媒体吹风会上表示，首批香港稳定币发行商牌照预计将于明年年初发放。【原文：The first batch of Hong Kong stablecoin issuer licences is expected to be granted early next year, the Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA) told a media briefing on Tuesday.】

item.title: 随着扭亏步伐加快，PayPal 将 2025 年利润预期上调至高于预期的水平
item.description: PayPal 周二上调了全年利润预期，高于华尔街预期，因为这家数字支付巨头推动 Venmo 和美国结账等高利润业务恢复增长的努力已初见成效。【原文：PayPal raised its full-year profit forecast above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, as the digital payments giant's push to revive growth in high-margin businesses such as Venmo and U.S. checkout begins to pay off.】

item.title: 肥胖症药物制造商诺和诺德下调2025年销售额增长和营业利润展望
item.description: 肥胖症药品制造商诺和诺德公司周二警告说，全年销售额和营业利润的增长将低于此前的预期，这是该公司在2025年第二次下调预期。【原文：Obesity drugmaker Novo Nordisk warned on Tuesday that full-year sales and operating profit would grow less than previously expected, marking its second forecast cut of 2025.】

item.title: 宝洁公司在领导层变动和关税影响下发出年度增长乏力的信号
item.description: 在汰渍母公司任命一位内部人士担任首席执行官，以指导公司度过关税不确定性的一天之后，宝洁公司周二预测，面对谨慎的消费者，公司的年度业绩将大大低于华尔街的预期。【原文：Procter & Gamble on Tuesday forecast annual results largely below Wall Street estimates in the face of cautious consumers, a day after the Tide parent named an insider as CEO to steer it through the tariff uncertainty.】

item.title: 联合太平洋公司将以 850 亿美元收购诺福克铁路公司
item.description: 联合太平洋铁路公司（Union Pacific）周二表示，将以 850 亿美元的价格收购规模较小的竞争对手诺福克南方铁路公司（Norfolk Southern），从而创建美国第一家海岸到海岸货运铁路运营商，并重塑全国从谷物到汽车的货物运输。【原文：Union Pacific said on Tuesday it would buy smaller rival Norfolk Southern in an $85 billion deal, to create the nation's first coast-to-coast freight rail operator and reshape the movement of goods from grains to autos across the country.】

item.title: LG Innotek 将入股激光雷达制造商 Aeva，作为 5000 万美元交易的一部分
item.description: Aeva Technologies 周二表示，作为 5000 万美元战略合作的一部分，韩国相机模组制造商 LG Innotek 将入股 Aeva。【原文：Aeva Technologies said on Tuesday that South Korean camera module maker LG Innotek will take an equity stake in Aeva as part of a $50 million strategic collaboration.】

item.title: 吉尔吉斯斯坦禁止网络色情，打击互联网自由
item.description: 吉尔吉斯斯坦总统萨迪尔-贾帕罗夫的办公室周二表示，根据总统签署的新法律，吉尔吉斯斯坦已禁止访问网上色情内容，并对互联网流量实施国家控制。【原文：Kyrgyzstan has banned access to online pornography and imposed state control over internet traffic under new laws signed by President Sadyr Japarov, his office said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 皇家加勒比因邮轮需求稳定而上调年度利润预期
item.description: 皇家加勒比公司周二上调了年度利润预期，原因是市场对该游轮运营商的高端私人岛屿目的地和优质航次的需求具有弹性。【原文：Royal Caribbean raised its annual profit forecast on Tuesday, banking on resilient demand for the cruise operator's high-end private island destinations and premium sailings.】

item.title: 贝克休斯将以 136 亿美元收购 Chart Industries
item.description: 石油和天然气设备供应商贝克休斯周二表示，将以 136 亿美元的全现金交易（包括债务）收购 Chart Industries，击败竞争对手 Flowserve .【原文：Oil and gas equipment supplier Baker Hughes said on Tuesday it would acquire Chart Industries in a $13.6 billion all-cash deal, including debt, edging out rival suitor Flowserve .】

item.title: 微软的人工智能优势受到质疑，OpenAI 转向竞争对手寻求云服务
item.description: 在周三的财报中，微软的投资者将面临一个大问题：随着合作伙伴OpenAI转向竞争对手谷歌、甲骨文和CoreWeave寻求云服务，微软的人工智能优势是否面临风险？【原文：Microsoft investors head into Wednesday's earnings with one big question: is the company's artificial intelligence edge at risk as partner OpenAI turns to rivals Google, Oracle and CoreWeave for cloud services?】

item.title: 富士康将于 7 月 30 日暂停股票交易，等待重大公告
item.description: 富士康（又称鸿海精密工业）表示，将于 7 月 30 日暂停股票交易，以待发布重大公告。【原文：Foxconn, also known as Hon Hai Precision Industry , said it will suspend share trading on July 30 pending a major announcement.】

item.title: 捷蓝航空与美联航合作获美国交通部批准
item.description: 捷蓝航空（JetBlue）和美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）周二表示，美国运输部（DOT）已通过对其蓝天合作计划的审查，允许它们继续实施蓝天合作计划。【原文：JetBlue and United Airlines have cleared a review of their planned Blue Sky partnership by the U.S. Department of Transportation (DOT) allowing them to proceed with the implementation, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价美元重新焕发活力
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 由于中国市场对加卫苗的需求依然疲软，默克将裁员减支
item.description: 由于中国市场对加卫苗（Gardasil）的需求持续疲软，默克公司周二公布了第二季度业绩，并宣布裁员和削减成本，称这将每年节省 30 亿美元。【原文：Merck & Co on Tuesday announced job and cost cuts it said will save $3 billion a year as it posted lower second-quarter results due to continuing weak demand for its Gardasil vaccine in China.】

item.title: 日本官员称，美日贸易协议保证芯片和制药业关税税率最低
item.description: 日本主要贸易谈判代表周二表示，东京上周与美国达成的贸易协议保证了日本将始终获得华盛顿谈判的所有协议中最低的芯片和药品关税税率。【原文：Japan's leading trade negotiator said on Tuesday that the trade deal Tokyo agreed with the United States last week guarantees Japan will always receive the lowest tariff rate on chips and pharmaceuticals of all the pacts negotiated by Washington.】

item.title: 债券投资者热衷风险，美联储在 "金发姑娘 "经济中按兵不动
item.description: 债券投资者在经历了长期的谨慎之后正在增加投资组合风险，他们认为美国经济正处于 "金发期"，不会太热也不会太冷，因为他们押注美联储将在连续第五次政策会议上维持利率不变。【原文：Bond investors are adding portfolio risk after a long period of caution, seeing the U.S. economy in a "Goldilocks" moment, not too hot nor too cold, as they bet the Federal Reserve will leave rates unchanged for a fifth straight policy meeting.】

item.title: 长江和记出售中国港口股份可缓解北京压力，但美国地缘政治风险依然存在
item.description: 消息人士和分析师称，中国航运巨头中远集团拟加入香港企业集团长江和记颇具争议的全球港口出售计划，这是中国政府在战略领域的一次潜在胜利，但该交易远非最终结果，而且可能面临来自华盛顿的阻力。【原文：The proposed inclusion of Chinese shipping giant COSCO in Hong Kong conglomerate CK Hutchison's contentious global ports sale is a potential win for Beijing in a strategic sector, but the deal is far from final and could face resistance from Washington, sources and analysts say.】

item.title: 西班牙监管机构扩大对苹果公司应用程序商店定价问题的调查范围
item.description: 西班牙反垄断监管机构周二表示，正在扩大对苹果公司可能存在的反竞争行为的调查，因为苹果公司涉嫌对在其应用市场上销售移动应用的开发商施加不平等的商业条件。【原文：Spain's antitrust regulator said on Tuesday it was expanding its investigation into possible anti-competitive behaviour by Apple for allegedly imposing unequal commercial conditions on developers of mobile applications sold at its app marketplace.】

item.title: 美联储的政策工具包或将发生根本性变化
item.description: 一位美国参议员最近推动剥夺美联储控制利率的一个关键环节，以及关于谁将接替美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔的争论，都预示着未来决策者用来影响经济的一些工具将受到更严格的审查。【原文：A U.S. senator's recent push to strip the Federal Reserve of a key aspect of how it controls interest rates and the battle over who will succeed Fed Chair Jerome Powell point to a future where some of the tools policymakers use to influence the economy come under greater scrutiny.】

item.title: 太空探索技术公司的火箭外交如何在巴哈马适得其反？
item.description: 据三位熟悉此事的人士透露，去年 SpaceX 公司与巴哈马谈判允许其猎鹰 9 号火箭助推器在巴哈马领土内着陆时，埃隆-马斯克的公司提供了一个甜头：为该国的国防舰艇提供免费的星链（Starlink）互联网终端。【原文：When SpaceX was negotiating a deal with the Bahamas last year to allow its Falcon 9 rocket boosters to land within the island nation's territory, Elon Musk's company offered a sweetener: complimentary Starlink internet terminals for the country's defense vessels, according to three people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 联合健康预计年度利润低于预期
item.description: 联合健康（UnitedHealth）周二恢复了两个月前下调的全年利润预期，但其指导性预期低于分析师已经下调的预期，因为这家美国医疗保险公司正在与政府支持计划中不断上涨的成本作斗争。【原文：UnitedHealth on Tuesday reinstated full-year profit forecast that it pulled over two months ago, but its guidance fell short of analysts' already-lowered expectations, as the U.S. health insurer battles rising costs in its government-backed plans.】

item.title: 贸易政策变化拖累 UPS 季度业绩下滑
item.description: 美国联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service）周二公布第二季度利润和收入下降，原因是对中国低价值货物征收新的 "微量 "关税，以及唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统贸易政策带来的风险不断增加，导致需求受到打击。【原文：United Parcel Service reported a decline in second-quarter profit and revenue on Tuesday, as demand took a hit from new "de minimis" tariffs on low-value Chinese shipments and mounting risks from President Donald Trump's trade policies.】

item.title: Spotify 预测利润低于预期，原因是税收增加，股价下挫
item.description: 本周二，Spotify 预计第三季度利润低于市场预期，原因是与员工工资相关的税费增加，超过了对其优质音乐流计划的乐观需求。【原文：Spotify forecast third-quarter profit below Street estimates on Tuesday as higher taxes related to employee salaries outweigh upbeat demand for its premium music-streaming plans.】

item.title: Meta 大胆押注 "超级智能 "的一年不太可能带来丰厚利润
item.description: 现在是马克-扎克伯格的紧要关头，他要使出浑身解数，在硅谷愈演愈烈的先进人工智能竞赛中保持优势。【原文：It's crunch time for Mark Zuckerberg as he pulls out all the stops to stay relevant in Silicon Valley's intensifying advanced artificial intelligence race.】

item.title: 华尔街期货上涨，焦点转向主要财报和美联储会议
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货走高，因为投资者在等待多家公司的财报以及当天晚些时候开始的美联储政策会议。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged higher on Tuesday as investors awaited earnings reports from a number of companies and the Federal Reserve's policy meeting that starts later in the day.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，波音/萨博正在与 BAE 就英国喷气教练机竞标进行谈判
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的人士透露，波音和瑞典萨博公司正在与英国 BAE 系统公司谈判，商讨未来联手研制英国鹰式教练机的替代品，以填补快速喷气机行业日益增长的空白。【原文：Boeing and Sweden's Saab are in talks with Britain's BAE Systems about teaming up on a future replacement of Britain's Hawk trainer in a growing niche of the fast jet industry, three people familiar with the matter said.】
